name: Tanagrams
description:
Complete tanagrams using basic geometric shapes made out of triangles.

Controls:

Mouse Only

Left Click and Hold - Drag Pieces

Right Click while Dragging - Rotate

Keyboard and Mouse

Left Click and Hold - Drag Pieces

Space Bar while Dragging - Rotate

Touch - Landscape ONLY

First Touch and Hold - Drag Pieces

Second Touch while Dragging - Rotate
